headline.print_headline: Crimean Court Bans Congress  Of Tatar People
headline.main: Tatar Legislature Is Banned in Crimea

snippet: Tatars, who were the lone voice of opposition to Russia’s annexation of Crimea, have often been subject to harassment there.
lead_paragraph: Tatars, who were the lone voice of opposition to Russia’s annexation of Crimea, have often been subject to harassment there.
